text: Bonald or Bonalde may refer to: * Honoré de Bonald (1894–?), aviator * Juan Antonio Pérez Bonalde (1846–1892), poet * Louis Gabriel Ambroise de Bonald (1754–1840), French philosopher and politician ** Victor de Bonald (1780–1871), son ** Louis Jacques Maurice de Bonald (1787–1870), son ==See also== * Bonalds Island, Canada
title: Bonald
